about_the_game:
The Isle of No Return is a first-person survival horror game that plunges you into the nightmare of an isolated prison island, where humanity's darkest secrets have been unleashed. After being shipwrecked on its shores, you find yourself trapped in a place where hope is lost and the only certainty is death.

Story:

You play as a fisherman who, after a devastating storm, is stranded on a mysterious island. You soon discover that this place is not just an ordinary prison, but a secret experimentation centre, where an experimental serum has transformed the inmates into bloodthirsty creatures. Your only option is to explore the abandoned prison, find resources, weapons and uncover the dark secrets surrounding it.

Key features:

  • Oppressive environment: Explore a vast prison island detailed with an eerie environment. From claustrophobic corridors to dangerous open areas, the atmosphere will keep you in constant tension.

  • Intense survival: Scavenge for supplies, weapons and stay alert. The creatures that roam the island are not your only enemy; loneliness and desperation also play against you.

  • Relentless enemies: The former inmates, now monsters twisted by a failed experiment, hunt relentlessly. Their brutality and endurance will make you question their every move.

  • Uncover the truth: Find notes and clues that will reveal the true story behind the horrific experiments. Each new discovery brings you closer to the dark heart of the island.

  • Deadly Decisions: Not every door must be opened and not every route leads to salvation. Every decision you make could be the difference between life and certain death.

Can you escape?

‘The island leaves no survivors’ is what the legends say - will you have what it takes to break the cycle and escape the nightmare... or will you become yet another victim of the nightmare? or will you become yet another victim of The Isle of No Return?

name: The Isle of No Return

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD® FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 750 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD® FX-8350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 970 / ATI Radeon R9 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows® (or equivalent) recommended

short_description: The Isle of No Return takes you to a forgotten prison island, where a dark experiment has unleashed unimaginable horrors. Explore, survive and uncover hidden secrets as you face bloodthirsty creatures in an environment where every step may be your last.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
